channel.title: [REQUEST] Need someone to fix a few things please =/
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my first post on here and i was hoping someone could help me pretty quick =/. I have no clue how to code and i bought a VPS for my server because the person who was coding for me said everything was done and i could release it. When i got on the server everything looked pretty good but i need a few things changed. Now the person who was coding for me is never on skype so i can't really ask him and my other friend who could help me is dealing with the hurricane Irene after effects. So if ANYONE could please change these 3 things on my server i'd be greatful as hell.
Contact me on AIM or MSN
AIM- iiiiiiepiciiiiii MSN- loganizbak@hotmail.com
The few things i want changed is the Home area with the shops, The xp rate, and Armadyl and Saradomin GWD both work 100% but there's no way to actually get IN the dungeon if someone can fix that. I also have a client problem but i don't think this is the section to ask about that.

item.title: [REQUEST] Need someone to fix a few things please =/
item.dc:creator: @I_hate_fails I hate fails
item.description:
@I_hate_fails wrote:

This is not even coding it’s the most basic of things can’t even be called “knowing java”

Read full topic
item.source: [REQUEST] Need someone to fix a few things please =/

item.title: [REQUEST] Need someone to fix a few things please =/
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

To change the home you need to change the teleport chords, Find the chords it’s teleporting you at the moment, and search the chords in the Search bar, Search the first 4 numbers which is the X chord Once you have found it change the chord to the place you want it to be… If it’s a new account go to Config.java (If PI), or player.java (Delta, Allstar etc), and find the chords for that… Then edit it to where you want…

For the Shops go to shops.cfg, there is shows all the shops it has at the moment… To add shops you press enter and you type in this

SHOPID = Id of the Shop E.G 3 would be the Shop id. The ID is needed so the NPC it’s selling is using the correct shop… if you get what i mean

SHOP NAME HERE = The name of the Shop. If you are adding Spaces then use _ insted of a space…

2 2 = Sell and Buy, If you want the shop to sell and buy only what it has keep it as 2 2, If you want it to buy anything and sell anything have it as 1 1

ID AMOUNT = The ID and the Amount the shop is selling. the ID is the ID of the Item, E.G 5698 10. This means it’s selling 10 Dragon Daggers(p++)…

The client section i can’t help cuse im hopeless at client editing lol

Read full topic
item.source: [REQUEST] Need someone to fix a few things please =/
